title: Lumpofcoal
author: Lumpofcoal
content: Hello all, As this is my first post here on this account I expect most of you to think what I am peddling is another shitcoin, but DBI is worth a look. A meme coin based on an IRL character who makes videos and interacts with celebrities. There is already a video with CZ from Binance and Jesse from Kraken. Check it out. I'll try to answer any questions here. Marketcap is 5 mil. IRL event 5/20/23 after BTC Miami.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: Lumpofcoal on May 13, 2023, 05:11:09 PMHello all, As this is my first post here on this account I expect most of you to think what I am peddling is another shitcoin, but DBI is worth a look. A meme coin based on an IRL character who makes videos and interacts with celebrities. There is already a video with CZ from Binance and Jesse from Kraken. Check it out. I'll try to answer any questions here. Marketcap is 5 mil. IRL event 5/20/23 after BTC Miami.First from your statement in the first paragraph,  it means this is your Alt account and at that you trying to mislead others because of you trust the project that much why don't you make this thread with your main account? And also the title of this topic is misleading,  you may try to change it to portray the right message you are trying to pass.
